amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Homeland Security to submit to Congress a timeline for: (1) equipping all land border ports of entry with the US-VISIT system; (2) developing and deploying at all land border ports of entry the exit component of the US-VISIT system; and (3) making interoperable all immigration screening systems operated by the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 109-347 to require DHS to submit a timeline for: (1) equipping all land borders with the US-VISIT entry/exit system; (2) developing and deploying the exit component of the US-VISIT system at all land borders; and (3) making all border screening systems operated by the Department interoperable.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castle amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
